overview:
Joe Pettersson is a UI engineer and interaction designer, he’s worked with some of the world’s largest companies and institutions, creating innovative user interfaces and experiences. He founded a successful consultancy in 2005 that he sold in 2010.

Joe currently works at Digital Science, a business unit of Macmillan publishers whose purview is to provide innovative tools to researchers and scientists, where he’s leads the Front-end development for it’s Text Mining business unit.

Joe lives in London where he’s actively involved in the technology and startup communities. He’s also an active and passionate contributor to many open source projects and is a passionate advocate for the open web and open data.
